alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:15AM CDT until April 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1215 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Stockton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockton Lake... Stockton State Park... Stockton... Arcola... Umber View Heights... Bearcreek... Masters... Cane Hill... Bona... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
